mapper.select: select u.uid uid, u.nickname nickname, u.avatar avatar, u.exp exp, ac.id id, ac.content content, ac.comment_status comment_status, l.num love_num, ac.create_time create_time from article_comment as ac left join user as u on ac.uid = u.uid left JOIN (select ac.id acid,count(lr.id) num from love_record as lr join article_comment as ac on ac.id = lr.acid GROUP BY(ac.id)) AS l ON l.acid = ac.id where ac.aid = #{aid} ORDER BY ac.create_time asc limit #{start},#{rows};

select u.uid uid, u.nickname nickname, u.avatar avatar, u.exp exp, ac.id id, ac.content content, ac.comment_status comment_status, l.num love_num, s.status status, ac.create_time create_time from article_comment as ac left join user as u on ac.uid = u.uid left JOIN (select ac.id acid,count(lr.id) num from love_record as lr join article_comment as ac on ac.id = lr.acid GROUP BY(ac.id)) AS l ON l.acid = ac.id left JOIN (select lr.id,ac.aid aid,ac.id acid,lr.uid,lr.status status from love_record as lr join article_comment as ac on lr.acid = ac.id where lr.uid = #{uid} GROUP BY(lr.id)) AS s on s.acid = ac.id where ac.aid = #{aid} ORDER BY ac.create_time asc limit #{start},#{rows};
select count(id) from article_comment where aid = #{aid};

insert into love_record (acid, uid, create_time, status) values(#{acid},#{uid},#{createTime},#{status});
